name: DeviceMetric.identifier
title: DeviceMetric.identifier
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Unique instance identifiers assigned to a device by the device or gateway software, manufacturers, other organizations or owners. For example: handle ID.
element.comment: For identifiers assigned to a device by the device or gateway software, the `system` element of the identifier should be set to the unique identifier of the device.
